verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During an interview with Reuters reporter Jeff Mason] , [ARG0: Shepard Smith] [V: intimated] [ARG1: that there is an intentional effort to " advise " Donald Trump through commentary on Fox News and elsewhere] .
